name: KIISA
slogan: KIISA develops and curates African & Diaspora art through creative global platforms
description: KIISA aims to produce unique content and disseminate knowledge of the Contemporary African art market via our website, newsletters, press and social media platforms.

jobs.title: Researcher
jobs.description:
We need someone to research and collate all the current art infrastructure across Africa and the Diaspora including Europe, UK, US, South America and the Caribbean. 

This will include a list of galleries, museums, art fairs, auctions houses etc.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We need someone to research and collate all the current art infrastructure across Africa and the Diaspora including Europe, UK, US, South America and the Caribbean.

This will include a list of galleries, museums, art fairs, auctions houses etc.
